item.title: ILLINOIS TOOL WORKS INC 10-K
item.description: ILLINOIS TOOL WORKS INC, which is in the General Industrial Machinery & Equipment [3560] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 10, 2023 had 26939 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 343 instances company’s - 333 instances 2022 - 315 instances 2021 - 252 instances operating - 240 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
